_id.description: Unique identifier for the history record

createdAt.description: Timestamp for the history record creation

wheelstacksData.description: object with all wheelstacks present in the placement at the time of record

_id.description: must be an objectId and is required

originalPisId.description: original id of the wheelstack we got from PIS db

batchNumber.description: batch number of the WheelStack, we can't have wheels with different batchNumbers inside the one Wheelstack

type.description: Currently used placement type for the `wheelstack`

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`), or `storage`

rowPlacement.description: must be a string and is required

colPlacement.description: must be a string and is required

createdAt.description: must be a date and is required

lastChange.description: must be a date and is required

lastOrder.description: `objectId` of the placed order, or `null` if no orders were ever placed

maxSize.description: must be an integer and is required

blocked.description: must be a boolean and is required

items.description: must be an `objectId` of the placed `wheel`s

wheels.description: must be an array of `objectIds` of the placed `wheel`s and is required

status.description: must be a string and is required

placementOrders.description: object with all `activeOrder` at the time of recording

createdAt.description: Timestamp for when the order was created

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp for the last update of the order

placementType.description: Source type (`grid` or `basePlatform`), from where we're taking it

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`)

rowPlacement.description: string identifier for the `row` of a source cell

columnPlacement.description: string identifier for the `column` of a source cell

placementType.description: We can move only from `basePlatform` -> `grid` or inside the `grid. Even if we `moveToLaboratory` we still move `wheelStack` to some `extra` element in a `grid` and later it's transitioned to lab

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`)

rowPlacement.description: string identifier for the `row` of a destination cell

columnPlacement.description: string identifier for the `column` of a destination cell

orderType.description: Type of operation (moveWholeStack, moveTopWheel, moveToLaboratory, mergeWheelStack)

source.description: `objectId` of the wheelstack currently placed on the source cell, source cell can't be empty

destination.description: `objectId` of the wheelStack currently placed on the destination cell, destination cell can be empty

items.description: `objectId`'s of the wheels stored in affected wheelStack on the source cell
`objectId`'s of the wheels stored in affected wheelStack on the destination cell

status.description: Status of the order, in `activeOrder` we can only have `pending` orders
